Government orders recall of all at-risk vehicles with Takata airbags and immobilizes 800,000 additional cars
subhead: The transport minister has expanded measures to protect drivers from accidental explosions of defective Takata airbags. Some 2.5 million vehicles are now affected, and among them, 1.7 million have been banned from being driven.

title: Lyon handed Ligue 2 relegation by financial regulator
subhead: Lyon can appeal the decision, but if their relegation is confirmed, they would be replaced in Ligue 1 by Reims.

title: From Peru to the Vatican, the rise of 'Monseñor Roberto de Chiclayo,' now Leo XIV
subhead: Francis's successor at the Vatican lived for many years in the South American country. Le Monde traveled to the city of Chiclayo to meet with several people who remember the days when he was still known as Robert Prevost.

title: 'They come in vans and arrest mothers': Fear of immigration raids grips Chicago
